name: generate-image-blog-post
description: Generate an image for a blog post

name: generate-image-speaker-event
description: Generate an image to announce a speaker for a conference
prompt: I would like to create an image from the template image %s integrating these elements: - replace 'Speaker Name' by %s  - replace 'Talk title' by %s. Please center this title and use 2 lines at maximum. - replace the first white square by the logo of the conference (in file1). - replace the second white square by the speaker photo (file2). Please don't modify the name of the author and the title of the talk.

name: generate-video-speaker-event
description: Generate a video to annunce a speaker for a conference
prompt: I'd like to create a short animation from the template file to move the speaker photo, the title of the talk.

name: generate-post-speaker-event
prompt: I'd like to create two post to announce %s as a speaker for the conference %s in %s. The first one is for Linkedin, the second for Bluesky.
